Is this a Server or Desktop Version ????

This appears to be the commercial Enterprise (server) version that is installed from your network, so you could add nodes from it, etc.
If it's a specific company's purchase it might not have all the drivers for a non-commercial platform (sound card, whatever) but you could d/l that obviously....I believe. I am NOT sure however as Red Hat is getting very similar to Suse (Novell) Linux and becoming a business oriented OS.
